description.originalText: Meghan Is the best of the best.  Meghan started taking care of my daughters when they were 1.5 and a newborn.  Meghan was a favorite in our house until she moved to NYC a few years ago.  She does it all! My kids adore Meghan and it’s no wonder as she played so lovingly and enthusiastically with them.  Meghan, also drove my kids safely to activities, got and served them meals and even helped me put together furniture and Christmas presents for the kids when they were napping.  I wish we still had the joy of having Megan in Chicago, but now a lucky NYC family will be as fortunate as us.

Meghan is everything you need in a babysitter that you didn’t know you needed. She’s reliable, responsible, intuitive, flexible, and super enjoyable to be around. She cared for our 4 young children with incredible patience and love. Her innate ability to anticipate what or who needs attention is a testament to her intelligence and experience. Don’t waste your time looking for someone else- Meghan is a parent’s dream come true. Did I mention she’s awesome with pets and plants and home management?!

description.displayText: We have known Meghan since her family moved next door to us 16 years ago.  Meghan has been like a part of our family.  Meghan was a 'Mommy's Helper' when our children were younger, and then babysat our children when she was older.  The children would always request Meghan as their sitter as they were always doing fun crafts, projects and activities while she was in charge.  Any family would be blessed to have Meghan as a part of their care-giving.  She is kind, personable, responsible and a great role model for any youngster, or teen.

description.displayText: Meghan is amazing! She is the first sitter I call when she is in town. My kids love her and love that she pays attention to them. She plays with them, does arts and crafts, and any other activities they may want to do. My girls are always excited when they know she is coming and hate seeing her leave. I am very lucky to find someone so responsible, dependable, and fun to be with my kids when I can't.
